org.robolectric.internal.bytecode

Class InstrumentingClassLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.ClassLoader
      • org.robolectric.internal.bytecode.InstrumentingClassLoader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.objectweb.asm.Opcodes

    public class InstrumentingClassLoader
extends ClassLoader
implements org.objectweb.asm.Opcodes
    Class loader that modifies the bytecode of Android classes to insert calls to Robolectric's shadow classes.
